alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Monroe County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1016 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Okolona, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Smithville, Hatley, Gattman, Sipsey Fork, New Hamilton, Becker, Quincy, Splunge, Wise Gap, Athens, East Aberdeen, Greenwood Springs and Parham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
